text: Above: From left, food products that include kimchi’s lactic acid bacteria - the Hand & Malt Brewing company’s K-Vice, Lotte Food Pasteur’s LB-9 Lactic Acid Milk and CJ CheilJedang’s BYO Skin Living Lactic Acid Bacteria. CJ Foodville’s Tous les Jours bakery presents an array of bread and cakes that contain lactic acid bacteria extracted from kimchi. title: Food manufacturers add lactic acid as appetite for it rises
